Name: VirtuousMulti Taste
Algorithm: Random Forest with multi-objective evolutionary optimization
Datasets: Trained on 360 compounds per class; tested on a larger external datasets, including: FooDB, FlavorDB, PhenolExplorer, Natural Product Atlas, PhytoHub

Algorithm: Transformer protein language model with SHAP for feature selection
Datasets: Trained on 189 food items with 1671 features (nutritional data, amino acid composition, protein sequences); tested on 7 food items from diverse sources

Name: Pro-PRIME
Datasets: Optimal growth temperatures from 96 million host bacterial strains + thermostability data for fine-tuning

Name: ESM-2
Datasets: Trained on 250 million protein sequences from UniRef50

Name: Evo
Datasets: Trained on the OpenGenome dataset

Name: EvoProtGrad
Datasets: Utilizes pretrained protein language models

Name: AlphaMissense
Datasets: Fine-tuned on human and primate variant frequency databases

Name: AlphaFold
Datasets: Trained on protein structures from the PDB

Name: AlphaFold3
Datasets: Trained on biomolecular complexes from PDB

Name: ESMFold
Datasets: Trained on 250 million protein sequences from UniRef50

Name: RoseTTAFold
Datasets: Trained on protein structures from the PDB

Name: RFDiffusion
Datasets: Fine-tuned on protein structure denoising tasks

Name: ProteinMPNN
Datasets: Trained on protein structures from the PDB

Name: LigandMPNN
Datasets: Trained on protein-ligand complexes from the PDB

Name: ThermoMPNN
Datasets: Trained on a mega-scale dataset

Name: BioNavi-NP
Datasets: 33710 biochemical reactions from MetaCyc and KEGG, etc.
1M organic chemical reactions from USPTO db, etc.

Name: ARCTICA
Datasets: Simulated data on Synechocystis sp. PCC 6803 strains

Name: AMN (Artificial Metabolic Network)
Algorithm: Hybrid neural-mechanistic model (ANN + FBA surrogate solvers: Wt, LP, QP)
Datasets: FBA-simulated and experimental datasets

Name: ART
Datasets: Simulated and experimental datasets (limonene, beer-flavor, dodecanol strains)

Name: MiYA
Datasets: Experimental datasets (S. cerevisiae engineered for β-carotene and violacein)

Name: REKINDLE
Datasets: 72,000 unique combinations of kinetic parameters from E. coli metabolism

Name: Generative Flowsheet Transformer
Datasets: Trained on synthetic (8,000+) and real flowsheets (223)
